name: library-lite
description: **Library Lite** — a lightweight digital library management platform built with **React** (frontend) and **Node.js / Express** (backend).   It helps small libraries and personal book collections manage books, members, lending, returns, fines and reports — with optional features like reservations, notifications, and barcode scanning.

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.clean: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist .vite

author: AmanCrafts
